title: T206 SL's and Commons - For Sale
author: Frazier

posts.post_title: T206 SL's and Commons - For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have the following PSA graded Commons, Slightly Harder Backed Commons and Southern League Cards for sale. See List below for cards available:

"OPEN TO OFFERS ON SALES OF MULTIPLE CARDS"

Southern League Cards:

Woodie Thornton - PSA 2.5, Old Mill back - SOLD
Ed Reagan - PSA 2.5, Piedmaont 350 back - SOLD
Bill Hart (Little Rock) - PSA 2, Piedmont 350 back - SOLD

Harder Back - Commons:

Izzy Hoffman - PSA 2.5, Sovereign 350 back - SOLD
Josh Devore - PSA 2, Piedmont 350/460, Factory 25 - SOLD
Rube Geyer - PSA 2.5, S/C 350/460, Factory 42 overprint - SOLD

Other Commons:

Cecil Ferguson - PSA 2, S/C 350, Factory 30 - SOLD
Al Mattern - PSA 2, Piedmont 350 - SOLD
Al Shaw - PSA 2.5, S/C 150, Factory 30 - SOLD
Heinie Zimmerman - PSA 2.5, Piedmont 350 - SOLD

Scans available by request to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url] or PM

Prices include shipping by USPS in a bubble mailer.

Thanks,

Bill

posts.post_title: T-206 S/L and Commons For Sale - PRICES REDUCED!
posts.post_content:
BUMP - All unsold prices have been lowered by 10% or more. I would like to move these cards today to avoid ebay fees and I would rather sell to the NET54 followers.

Thanks,

Bill

Thanks to all purchasers.

Much appreciated,

Bill
